response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its immense value to you stands at $1,200,000. Considering this, we propose to offer it to you at a price of $1,350,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, allowing us both to benefit. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction with excellent customer service and support throughout the process. If you require any further information or have questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 1350000}
